metadata.documentation: Freely available
Transmitted through Unidata Internet Data Distribution.
Read by CDM Forecast Model Run Collection.

documentation.xlink:title: NCEP/NWS Model Analyses and Forecasts Page

creator.name: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)/National Weather Service (NWS) National Center for Environmental Prediction (NCEP)

metadata.documentation: NCEP Global Forecast System Model, previously called AVN/MRF (Medium Range Forecast)

documentation.xlink:title: COMET MetEd (Meteorology Education and Training) documentation

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 203 (J) Grid. National - Alaska (polar stereographic). Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out 5 days. Horizontal = 45 by 39 points, resolution 190.5 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 211 (Q) Grid. Regional - CONUS (Lambert Conformal). Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out 10 days. Horizontal = 93 by 65 points, resolution 81.27 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels (29 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 213 (H) Grid. National - CONUS - Double Resolution (polar stereographic). Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out 5 days. Horizontal = 129 by 85 points, resolution 95.25 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 202 (I) Grid. National - CONUS (polar stereographic). Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out 5 days. Horizontal = 65 by 43 points, resolution 190.5 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 230 (G) Grid. Global Lat/Lon grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours from 96 to 180 hours (4 to 7.5 days). Horizontal= 361 by 720 points, resolution 0.5 degree, Lat/Lon projection. Vertical= 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 229 (F) Grid. Global Lat/Lon grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 180 hours (7.5 days). Horizontal = 181 by 360 points, resolution 1 degree, Lat/Lon projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 228 (A) Grid. Global Lat/Lon grid. Model runs are made at every 12 hours from 192 to 384 hours (8 to 16 days). Horizontal= 73 by 144 points, resolution 2.5 degree, Lat/Lon projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 204 (K) Grid. National-Hawaii. Model runs are made at 0Z, with analysis and forecasts every 12 hours out 10 days. Horizontal= 93 by 68 points, resolution 160 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 201 (A) Grid. Northern Hemisphere (polar stereographic). Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out 5 days. Horizontal = 65 by 65 points, resolution 381.0 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 205 (L) Grid. National - Puerto Rico (polar stereographic). Model runs are made at 0Z, with analysis and forecasts every 12 hours out 10 days. Horizontal = 45 by 39 points, resolution 190.5 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Nonhydrostatic Mesoscale Model (NMM) and Gridpoint Statistical Interpolation (GSI) analysis, running in the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) infrastructure.

documentation.xlink:title: COMET MetEd (Meteorology Education and Training) documentation

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model: AWIPS 242 (S) Grid over Alaska. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours (3.5 days). Horizontal = 553 by 425 points, resolution 11.25 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model: AWIPS 217 (Y) Grid over Alaska - Double Resolution. Model runs are made at 0 and 12Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 60 hours. Horizontal = 277 by 213 points, resolution 22.5 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = surface, height above ground, pressure layer (2D levels only)

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 216 (V) grid over Alaska. Model runs are made at 0 and 12Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 60 hours. Horizontal = 139 by 107 points, resolution 45.0 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 216 (V) grid over Alaska. Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours (3.5 days). Horizontal = 139 by 107 points, resolution 45.0 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 207 (N) Regional - Alaska. Model runs are made at 0 and 12Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out to 60 hours. Horizontal = 49 by 35 points, resolution 95.25 km, Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 218 (B) grid over the continental United States. Model runs are made at 06Z, 12Z, 18Z and 00Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours (3.5 days). Horizontal = 614 by 428 points, resolution 12.19 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels (29).

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 218 (B) grid over the continental United States. Model runs are made at 06Z, 12Z, 18Z and 00Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours (3.5 days). Horizontal = 614 by 428 points, resolution 12.19 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = small number of mandatory pressure levels, lots of surface fields.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

dataset.name: NCEP-NAM-CONUS_20km
dataset.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 215(U) grid over the continental United States - Quadruple Resolution. Horizontal = 369 by 257 points, resolution 20.31 km, LambertConformal projection.

metadata.documentation: Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours. Vertical = surface, height above ground, layers, and 1000 to 150 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: Model runs are made at 00Z, and 12Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours; and at 06Z, and 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 48 hours. Vertical = surface, 2m, and 10m, 2D fields only.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: Model runs are made at 00Z, and 12Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 60 hours; and at 06Z, and 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 48 hours. Vertical = surface, height above ground, and 1000 to 30 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 212 (R) Regional - CONUS - Double Resolution. Horizontal = 185 by 129 points, resolution 40.63 km; LambertConformal projection. Vertical = surface, 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels, layers, and depth.
Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z and have analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 211 (Q) Regional - CONUS (Lambert Conformal). Model runs are made at 12Z and 00Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out to 60 hours. Horizontal = 93 by 65 points, resolution 81.27 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 105 Grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours. Horizontal = 147 by 110 points, resolution 90.75 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Rapid Update Cycle (RUC) Model: frequently updated short-range weather forecasts.

documentation.xlink:title: COMET MetEd (Meteorology Education and Training) documentation

metadata.documentation: NCEP Rapid Update Cycle 2 (RUC2). Horizontal = 301 by 225 points, resolution 20.31 km, Lambert Conformal projection.
Surface parameters. Model runs are made hourly, with analysis and hourly forecasts out to 3 hours; on the 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 21Z runs, also 5, 6, 8, 9, 11, 12 hour forecasts.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: Parameters on pressure levels. Model runs are made hourly, with analysis and hourly forecasts out to 9 hours; on the 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 21Z runs, hourly out to 12 hours.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: Parameters on hybrid levels. Model runs are made hourly, with analysis and hourly forecasts out to 3 hours; on the 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 21Z runs, also 6, 9, and 12 hour forecasts.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Model output Rapid Update Cycle (RUC2). Model runs are made hourly, with analysis and hourly forecasts out to 3 hours; on the 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 21Z runs, there are also 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 12 hour forecasts. Horizontal = 151 by 113 points, resolution 40.63 km, LambertConformal projection.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Model output Rapid Update Cycle (RUC). Model runs are made hourly, with analysis and 3 hour forecast; on the 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 21Z runs, there are also 6, 9, and 12 hour forecasts. Horizontal = 93 by 65 points, resolution 81.27 km LambertConformal projection.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: The NCEP DGEX Model is the Eta model extended to 8 days over smaller domains using the operational Eta model 78 hour forecast and GFS boundary conditions.

documentation.xlink:title: COMET MetEd (Meteorology Education and Training) documentation

metadata.documentation: NCEP Model output Grid 185 (C) horizontal = 491 by 303 points, resolution 12 km, LambertConformal projection. Model runs are made at 6 and 18Z, with forecasts starting at 84 hours, every 6 hours out to 192 hours

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Model output AWIPS Grid 186 (C) horizontal = 377 by 237 points, resolution 12 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Model runs are made at 0 and 12Z, with forecasts starting at 84 hours, every 6 hours out to 192 hours

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Global Ensemble Forecasting System (GEFS) Global one degree Lat/Lon grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, 18 ... hours out to 378 hours. Horizontal = 181 by 360 points, resolution 1 degree, Lat/Lon projection. Vertical = 2000 to 1000 hPa mandatory pressure levels (7 levels); pressure, height above ground, pressure_difference_layers.
Derived Products: mean, spread, and probability products.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: Ensemble members.
NCEP Short Range Ensemble Forecast (SREF)
NCEP Short Range Ensemble Forecast (SREF) over CONUS with 185 by 129 points, resolution 40 km. Models are run daily at 3,9,15,and 21Z. Forecasts every 3 hours from 3 to 87 hours.
NCEP SREF CONUS 40km derived products: mean, spread, and probability.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP SREF CONUS 40km derived products: bias-corrected mean, spread, and probability.

metadata.documentation: NCEP SREF CONUS 40km: Bias-corrected products, ensemble members.

metadata.documentation: National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD): US National Weather Service gridded forecasts of sensible weather elements.
1073 by 689 points, resolution 5 km. Models are run daily at 12Z and 18Z. Forecasts every 6 hours from 90 to 180 hours.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD): US National Weather Service gridded forecasts of sensible weather elements.
1073 by 689 points, resolution 5 km. Models are run hourly. Forecasts every 3 hours from 2 to 74 hours and every 6 hours from 74 to 170.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Wave Watch III (WW3): US National Weather Service gridded forecasts of sensible weather elements.
720 by 336 points, resolution 30 minute. Models are run daily at 0Z, 6Z, 12Z and 18Z. Forecasts every 3 hours from 0 to 72, every 6 hours from 72 to 180 hours.
